Name: amh-muhammedsadiqan-la
Author: Muhammed Sadiq And Muhammed Sani Habib

Translations.Text: yihichi gilits’i kehonewi mets’ihafi anik’ets’ochi nati፡፡
amanyochi balemehonachewi፤ (bek’uch’iti) nefisihini gedayi mehoni yiferalihali፡፡
binisha be’inesu layi kesemayi te‘amireni inaweridina anigetochachewi (meriwochachewi) le’iriswa tewarajochi yihonalu፡፡
ke’alirehimanimi zenidi adisi yetewerede k’uri’ani ayimet’alachewimi፤ ke’irisu yemisheshu bihonu iniji፡፡
be’irigit’imi asitebabelu፡፡ yeziyami be’irisu yisalek’ubeti yeneberuti werewochi (fits’ame) yimet’abachewali፡፡
wede midirimi bewisit’wa kemelikami (bek’ayi) gosa hulu bizuni inidabek’elini alayumini፡፡
bezihi asidenak’i milikiti alilebeti፡፡ abizanyochachewimi amanyochi alineberumi፡፡
getahimi irisu be’irigit’i ashenafi azanyi newi፡፡
